body_html:
Unfortunately, loading custom op libraries from the C API isn't fully functional now
(and worked around using RTLD_GLOBAL in Python).

The good news is that @allenlavoie is working on a fix. No immediate ETA, but long story short - loading custom op libraries might not work outside of Python yet, but we're on it.

(Related issue #10454)

body:
Unfortunately, loading custom op libraries from the C API isn't fully functional now
(and worked around using [`RTLD_GLOBAL` in Python](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/python/pywrap_tensorflow.py#L40)).

The good news is that @allenlavoie is working on a fix. No immediate ETA, but long story short - loading custom op libraries might not work outside of Python yet, but we're on it.

(Related issue #10454)
